message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I can do $92, which is the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $92 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $88?
I'm getting a bit hesitant to go lower, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $92 was a bit too high, but I can do $94, which is the highest I'm willing to go.
I'm still not comfortable with $94. I was thinking more along the lines of $89. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $96, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
